oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Music City July 4th celebration in Nashville, Tennessee, 2015
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the fireworks during the Music City July 4th: Let Freedom Sing! hosted in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. The fireworks were the biggest in Nashville’s history and the largest in the nation. The spectacular display was synchronized to live music performed by the Nashville Symphony. The giant illuminated guitar sign of Hardrock Cafe Nashville (100 Broadway) is pictured on the right. Forms part of Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
